ygData.subject: VERY OT: Video Clips Wanted
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi guys! Sorry about the spam and the crossposting, but I m getting desperate... I ve been searching for cool swimming pool video clips for a project for work,
ygData.messageBody:
Hi guys! Sorry about the spam and the
crossposting, but I'm getting desperate...

I've been searching for cool swimming pool video
clips for a project for work, but they must be
family friendly. I will pay TOP DOLLAR to anyone
who can send me the entire episodes of The
Flintstones - "The Swimming Pool" and The
Simpsons - "Bart of Darkness" [the pool episode].
Any good clips from movies (ie: The candy bar
scene from 'CaddyShack', etc...) TV Shows,
commercials or music videos are wanted. If you
don't have the actual clip, but have a good
suggestion I'd appreciate that as well.

Please, respond to me personally - DO NOT RESPOND
TO THE LIST! My email is Selene1212@...

Thank you for your time & please forgive me for
the spam...


=====
* Selene *
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
